data.eml:eml: New eriophyoid mites (Acari: Prostigmata: Eriophyoidea) from banana and heliconia in Northeastern Brazil—two new genera and three new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reis, Aleuny C., Gondim, Manoel G. C., Navia, Denise, Flechtmann, Carlos H. W. (2011): New eriophyoid mites (Acari: Prostigmata: Eriophyoidea) from banana and heliconia in Northeastern Brazil—two new genera and three new species. Zootaxa 3042: 15-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206677
